title: Pavel Laktiushkin - projects list
seoDescription: Pavel Laktiushkin is involved in the following projects

projects.name: Video Cloud
projects.description: Rhonda Celesta Cloud is a distributed high-available scalable complex platform designed to receive, store, and deliver multimedia and other data.
projects.duties: Backend platform: Feature design and development, bug fixing, performance profiling and optimising

projects.name: Corporate ERP
projects.description: Modular web application which provides services for corporate needs. Implements both WebUI and REST API integration endpoints.
projects.duties: Full-stack design and development from scratch.

projects.name: YESP main site
projects.description: A e-commerce platform, based on Broadleaf commerce, which implements the 'group buy' business process. The site consists of both user-side web application and admin web application.
